name: dr.active
description: Developed a regression model using RDKit and scikit-learn's random forest to predict binding affinity (MAE) from SMILES string and target name with 70% accuracy. Subsequently implemented a Graph Neural Network to increase arruracy by 15%. Used Gradio to deploy to web.

name: GopherGuessr
description: Wrote frontend code for a UMN-based location guessing app using JSX, React, and Tailwind to implement leaderboards, user profiles, and gameplay loop UI.
